source.query:
select 
 MitarbeiterID 
      , Aktiv 
      , Status 
      , Vorname 
      , Nachname 
      , AnlageDatum 
      , MandantID 
      , CurrencyID 
,StundenerfassungPreis,
Zahlungsfrist,
arbeitsverhaeltnis,
FirstJob,
externalid,
MWSTArt
from `mitarbeiter`

select
   at.*,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(AT.inhalt, ';', numbers.n), ';', -1) INHALT_NEW
from
  (select 1 n union all
   select 2 union all select 3 union all
   select 4 union all select 5 union all
   select 6 union all select 7 union all
   select 8 union all select 9) numbers INNER JOIN auftrag_textmodul at
  on CHAR_LENGTH(AT.inhalt)
     -CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(AT.inhalt, ';', ''))>=numbers.n-1

select
   at.*,
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(AT.inhalt, ';', numbers.n), ';', -1) INHALT_NEW
from
  (select 1 n union all
   select 2 union all select 3 union all
   select 4 union all select 5 union all
   select 6 union all select 7 union all
   select 8 union all select 9) numbers INNER JOIN angebot_textmodul at
  on CHAR_LENGTH(AT.inhalt)
     -CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(AT.inhalt, ';', ''))>=numbers.n-1
